item.description: 2022-05c ItÂ´s us again again! This time weÂ´ve published the 2022-05c Update which is a very small one. It changed the API a bit again. This time for security reasons. Head over to GitHub to see the full changelog: https://github.com/mailcow/mailcow-dockerized/releases/tag/2022-05c Stay healthy Niklas 2022-05b ItÂ´s us again! Today we have a small API Fix Update which focus mainly on the UI. As some of you reported the API Calls for Domains/Mailboxes donÂ´t work anymore if there is no Tag set.
